tiers.name: Tax Office
tiers.effect: Each Kingdom Turn, the kingdom gains 1 Gold
tiers.special: Only one Taxation structure may exist in the kingdom at a time

tiers.name: Counting House
tiers.effect: Each Kingdom Turn, the kingdom gains 2 Gold. PCs may attempt the Personal Income kingdom action
tiers.special: Only one Taxation structure may exist in the kingdom at a time

tiers.name: Treasury
tiers.effect: Each Kingdom Turn, the kingdom gains 4 Gold. PCs may attempt the Personal Income action (Income T3)
tiers.special: Only one Taxation structure may exist in the kingdom at a time

tiers.name: Exchequer
tiers.effect: Each Kingdom Turn, the kingdom gains 8 Gold. PCs may attempt the Personal Income action (Income T4)
tiers.special: Only one Taxation structure may exist in the kingdom at a time
